articles.title: Samurai Gunn 2 coming to Steam Early Access summer 2021, Switch later - Polygon
articles.description: Developer Beau Blyth’s long-awaited platform fighter Samurai Gunn 2 will hit Steam Early Access this summer, coming to Nintendo Switch later. It will include new buddies from games like Minit and Spelunky 2.
